    • Method Detail

      • followsSuit

        public static boolean followsSuit(Card check,
                                  Card lead)
        Check if a card has the same suit as the lead.
        Parameters:
        check - the Card to test
        lead - the Card lead, or null if this is the first card of the trick
        Returns:
        true if the suits of the two cards are the same, false otherwise

      • playable

        public static boolean playable(Card check,
                               Player p,
                               Card lead)
        Check if it is legal to play a card. The card is legal if the following conditions are met: - The card is in the player's hand. - The suit of the card is the same as the suit of the lead, unless either of the following are true: - The card being played is the lead - The player can't follow suit
        Parameters:
        check - the card to test
        p - the person playing the card, before it's removed from their hand
        lead - the Card lead, or null if this is the first card of the trick
        Returns:
        true if this is a legal play, false otherwise

      • playerName

        public static java.lang.String playerName(int player)
        Get the name of a player from their number.
        Parameters:
        player - the number of the player
        Returns:
        the name of the player as a String

      • declarer

        public static int declarer(java.util.List<Call> calls,
                           int side,
                           int strain,
                           int dealer)
        Find the declarer of an auction.
        Parameters:
        calls - the auction history
        side - the side to make the last bid
        strain - the strain of the last bid
        dealer - the person who bid first
        Returns:
        the declarer
